SEARCH
Package com.ultreon.craft.util

Class IntSizedList<T>

java.lang.Object
com.ultreon.craft.util.IntSizedList<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type to use for the partition value.
public class IntSizedList<T> extends Object
This class is used for dynamically change ranges or get values from an index (based create all ranges merged). One problem: it can cause performance issues. But, so far currently known is this the fastest method.
